attributes.comment:
As a family just beginning the adoption process, we are concerned about the
potential increase in fees to adopt internationally. International adoption is about
American families desiring to love and care for an orphan, to give them a family.
With a potential $460 increase in the current fees, which may have to be paid
twice if the wait time is too long, could mean the difference of a loving home and
family for a child or a foreign orphanage. Adopting children into good homes in the
United States is an investment in the future of our country. We ask that you
consider these issues and not raise fees. Thank you for your time.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Melissa Cameron
